features: 【Bluetooth 5.1】This portable Bluetooth speaker with wireless microphone for adults has built-in Bluetooth 5.1 and can works within 32 feet distance.This portable Bluetooth speaker can give a more stable single to connect all Bluetooth devices and you can use it without worrying about sudden signal cut.

【Strong Sound Penetration】This Bluetooth speaker is adopted advanced strong MP3 audio decoding technology so that its sound quality is clear and strong. This wireless speaker is equipped with high reduction electro-acoustic system and has the feature of LED light show.

【Convenient and Lightweight】This kids karaoke machine is so lightweight that it’s very suitable for children to sing songs. The speaker will prompt a tone, indicating that the connection is successful and the blue light keeps on. If the device is not connected, the blue indicator blinks. Once paired, you can press the Short Press Play to play or pause the music.

【Ideal Gift】This wireless speaker has many practical functions, which is perfect for KTV singing, gathering singing, family singing, travel, party, speech, class, etc. Put it in an exquisite gift box, and then give it to your friends or family as a gift. This Bluetooth speaker will bring your friends or family a wonderful singing experience at indoor or outdoor parties！

【Products Guarantee】This wireless speaker with 5W loud stereo sound enjoys our 12-month warranty, and friendly customer service. The package includes a karaoke machine, 1 wireless hand-held microphone, and a user manual. If there are any problems with our products, please contact us anytime and we shall be very glad to solve the problem for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with my purchase . I knew my granddaughter would absolutely love this . She’s been singing since she received it . The sound it puts out is amazing . The whole front lights up too . It is a powerful little machine . The value is very good & made well . It’s exactly as described , arrived quickly too . I definitely recommend, this is a fun gift to give for any little singer you know .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible sound for the size!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It was actually shocking how loud it could get and the clarity is pretty good too. So super cute & compact. It doesn’t take up space at all. I loved the dual mics so more than one person could sing along. I think I loved it more because I plan on buying another for myself haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: Granddaughter is obsessed with this little karaoke machine. She loves the pink colir, neon lights and small size. She has friends over for Swiftie gatherings. Was the perfect Christmas present, score!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little gift
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my two kids for Christmas. They were always fighting over the one karaoke microphone we had and I loved that this had the option for two microphones so they could both sing. The sound quality is awesome and very loud for the size and cost of the product. Additionally, I love that you just charge the pieces and don’t have to fool with replacing batteries!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for price and very fun for kids
reviews.reviewText: This is super tiny and very cute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my toddler daughter. At first I was a bit disappointed by how small the speaker was and almost returned it but decided it would be a good stocking stuffer.Christmas Day arrived and I was absolutely impressed. Don’t let the small form factor fool you. This speaker is LOUD and the audio is pretty clear.The speaker has been used a few times everyday since Christmas and is still holding the charge that it came with out of the box.Me being a typical guy admittedly did not read the directions and didn’t realize it had Bluetooth capability. Just looked at the instructions today and connected my phone to it. Music playing through this speaker sounded great. It can easily be used as a stand alone speaker indoors.My daughter has really enjoyed putting on performances with this and I didn’t let its size fool me. Great purchase and great little speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal. Works great.
reviews.reviewText: This little box surprised me on the loud sound that comes out. 2nd item bought for 2nd child. They LOVE LOVE LOVE it. Great item for karaoke. It has given hours of fun and definitely preoccupied an 8 & 5 yr old girls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE the quality... not always the singing lol
reviews.reviewText: My 8 year old got this for Christmas and absolutely loves it! Its so cute and small that its easy to take around with her. I love that she enjoys it and she sings to her own "tune" :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Encourages your kids to hone their talent.
reviews.reviewText: Looks sturdy and durable for its intended purpose. Well-built with no flaws in manufacturing. I like how it has a PU handle to make carrying this around easy, specially for kids.Has 6 buttons on the machine, and 3 buttons on the mic.The color display is surprisingly very good. Rotating rainbow colors or solid breathing changing lights. Very vivid and attractive.The manual lacks depth and the print is so minute. With a large box, they could have printed a page with bigger font and it still would fit the box. The manual does give you a basic rundown of the functions.The mic is so cute and controls reverb and volume (3 settings for each). The sound coming out of the machine is not the best quality (lacking in low freq) but is acceptable, specially if this was to be given to a kid.It also has magic sound which changes the frequency of the voice. Funny.The machine and the mic are rechargeable which is a good thing. Gone are the days scouring the house for batteries. Came with a USB A to USB C cable.Music can be played via bluetooth, which easily connects and has good fidelity. It also has a TF card slot, and USB A port. You can control the music tracks with the machine. There is also a aux port for ear/headphones.Price is unavailable but an exact item being sold by other sellers have the exact unit plus an extra mic that goes for $59.99Overall, this is a great gift for kids and adults too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fun for the whole family - 🎶🎤🎶 - powerful sound!
reviews.reviewText: Hi Folks,Today I’m reviewing a karaoke machine.Small but oh-so-mighty 🎶💃🏽🪩💃🏽🎶First, let's talk about the size. It's like holding a musical gem in the palm of my hand. Portable, lightweight, and designed for tiny hands to grip comfortably – it's the perfect karaoke companion for kids.Check, check, 1,2,3, 🪩🎤🪩:But don't let its size fool you; the microphones are loaded with features. Bluetooth connectivity? Check✅! Lights that add a sprinkle of disco💃🏽🪩💃🏽 magic to our performance? Double-check ✅✅ It's like a karaoke party waiting to happen, anytime, anywhere.Sound quality 📢🎵📢:It's surprisingly good for a device this compact. I expected it to sound like a chipmunk's rendition of my favourite songs, but nope, it delivers clear and crisp sound that can fill a room with musical joy.Modes ✅💃🏽✅Here's the kicker – the voice modes. Want to sound like a rockstar 🎸, a chipmunk 🐿️ , or an alien 👽? I can change the mode to match my mood, which means endless fun and laughter for kids (and maybe some adults too).Let’s charge this thing 🔋🎤🔋:No need to hunt for batteries when we are in the middle of a karaoke showdown. Just plug it in, charge it up, and we’re ready for round two (or three, or four).In conclusion💃🏽💃🏽🪩🪩💃🏽💃🏽:This Kids Karaoke Machine is a small but mighty powerhouse of fun and entertainment. It's perfect for impromptu sing-offs, dance parties, and just letting our inner superstar shine. Me and my daughter had a blast, and I have a feeling many more karaoke battles are in our future. 🎤🌟🎉I hope this review help’s 🎶🎤🎶

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well, doesn't take up much space either which is nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s portable and great for kids that love singing. The controls on top of the speaker allow you to control the track, volume and LED lights. The device itself isn't hugely powerful, but plenty loud enough, but is perfect for kids, whilst being light and small enough for them to carry around

reviews.reviewTitle: Has so many great features making this an amazing Karaoke machine but the user manual is lacking
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Having a Bluetooth speaker and a paired microphone for Karaoke seemed like a great idea. This little Karaoke setup seemed to have a lot of features that I had to try.After receiving this portable karaoke setup I realized the user manual was not the greatest so I ended up spending some extra time figuring out the features this small setup has.Firstly, both the microphone and speaker charge with a USB-A to USB-C cable. Once they are charged you turn them both on with the respective power-on buttons and they pair together. You can also pair the Bluetooth speaker with your phone so you can play music from your phone to the speaker. Another option available is that you can put your music on a micro SD card which you put into the speaker. You can then play your music from the micro SD card.I will go through a few of the features since the product page gives very little information.There are several buttons on the speaker itself. There is a power button. This turns the speaker off and on. It also doubles as a pause/play button.There is a button that looks like a microphone. This button cuts down the volume of the vocals on the music so the instrumental sounds are louder and you can then hear your voice when you add your vocals with the microphone.The button that looks like a light bulb changes the LEDs around the speaker. They can be multiple colors, solid colors, or flashing to the music depending on how many times you press the button.The plus and minus buttons control the speaker's volume.On the back of the speaker is the charging port and the micro SD slot. There is also a headphone jack so you can use wired headphones.The microphone has an on/off button. The plus and minus buttons control the volume of the microphone. They also control the amount of reverb. You have to double-tap these buttons to increase or decrease incrementally the amount of reverb.The button that is the most fun is the bottom button on the microphone. They call it a magic voice button and it alters your voice. Pressing this button multiple times cycles between various interesting voices. There are some that sound like a chipmunk and some that make your voice alien or very low. This feature alone is a lot of fun. I have attached a video demonstrating this feature.So, with all these features and controls does this sound any good? Yes, it does. The sound from the speaker is surprisingly good.Once the mic is paired with the speaker it maintains its connection well.There is a bit of an annoying squeal when you are changing the volume or reverb. This is to let you know that the change has been accepted but is unnecessary.After discovering all the features built into this karaoke set I am amazed at everything it will do and it's a lot of fun even for an adult. I am not sure why OUTUVAS does not advertise these features better and the user manual is hard to follow.If you are willing to spend some time experimenting with the buttons and the sounds and learning what this can do you will be impressed.For such a small speaker with so many features and for the price they are asking it's a great value. I only wish the user manual was a little clearer.
